name: Richard Construction Company, Inc., Appellant, v. Martin & Nettrour Contracting Company
name_abbreviation: Richard Construction Co. v. Martin & Nettrour Contracting Co.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Pomeroy, JJ.

parties: Richard Construction Company, Inc., Appellant, v. Martin & Nettrour Contracting Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen and Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Frank J. Kernan, with him John L. Spiegel, and Plowman and Spiegel, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
Richard Construction Company, Inc., Appellant, v. Martin & Nettrour Contracting Company.
Argued October 1, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Pomeroy, JJ.
Frank J. Kernan, with him John L. Spiegel, and Plowman and Spiegel, for appellant.
Clayton A. Sweeney, with him Buchanan, Ingersoll, Bodewald, Kyle & Buerger, for appellee.
June 28, 1971:
